game_description: When the bug army attacked Cacti Island, the Cacti Army deployed you into battle. Together with your comrade Emilio, you fight many battles in the trenches, cities, and woods of Cacti Island, unraveling the story behind the backstabbing attack of the bug army. While on your adventure, you make new friends, learn new skills, and survive the relentless attacks of the bugs. This WW2 themed VR story shooter brings your weapon combat skills to a new level while taking you on a marvelous adventure though the Cactus Cowboy World.
review_1: This game is so immersive that I went outside and killed every ant and worm I saw. This game has voice acting like no other and I feel like a real cactus Graphics: 10/10 Story: 15/10 Gun play: 9/10 Length: really long Cactusness: 1000/10 Fun: killing bugs/10 Overall: 100/10
review_2: This game should be recommended to everyone who like shooter games and want to experience what war feels like. This game's story mode is amazing and should be highly appreciated. The guns are so good they feel like you are actually functioning a gun! The graphics are cool too and when playing, you feel like you are actually going through war like in a TV show. Cactus cowboy has a really nice story mode, cool characters, and more amazing things! I highly suggest you play this game if you love war and shooter games.
review_3: Easy one of the best shooter games on the quest. A fully fledged campaign with great mechanics. So to hear today that a new game in the series is coming soon fills me with so much excitement. I cannot wait mate. Keep doing what you are doing. Bravo
review_4: Absolutely love this game at first I was kind of hesitant because it was so goofy but the gameplay is super fun and the game has made me laugh on multiple occasions now as well as surprisingly stunning set pieces for different levels
review_5: This is a game for people that are experienced with VR shooters there is ammo you have to manually reload and more. This game is so good it does not deserve to be on app lab anymore it should become a real game that people will buy! The characters are good the story is good the characters are good it's just straight up good. I recommend super hot if you want to start playing VR shooters and not this.
